column4: ok, so i just installed ubuntu, and everything went fine, but now i use my computer for 10 minutes and randomly my mouse/keyboard stops working
both usb
is dbus or hal crashing or something?
grrrr.
what do your logs say
dmesg?  what log?
dmesg would be a good start dont you think
problem is, obviously once keyboard dies i can't type 'dmesg'
it has to be a known bug with my chipset or something... i wonder if a kernel upgrade will patch it
lol, i guess i could ssh from my iphone
yea its the kernel
how can i force a kernel upgrade?  I'm new to adept ...
i dont use ubuntu...i come in for entertainment, and maybe help if im bored
i would bet money its not the kernel
if you were a good boy and read your logs youll learn a lot
yeah, i'll start with dmesg from my mac next time it dies
/var/logs
have you read the logs yet?
logs before you change
i'm looking through syslog right now, dont see anything really pertaining to usb devices halting
i wonder if it has to do with power managment of hal or something....
i remember hearing about th is
alright, im telling you - find out what is causing it before you change shit
yeah of course, i'm looking at logs right n ow.  syslog and kern.log and debug
